name: Bow String Squire Small
description: This replacement bow string is for small bows. When you use your bow during an entire season sometimes it is necessary to replace the string.  Never try to repair the string yourself, just replace it to be able to play safely. Remember that replacement is part of the regular maintenance when owning a bow, check periodically before and during events.

name: IDV Bow String 140cm
description: Bow strings sometimes need replacement and the IDV bows are no exception. This bow string was made for all IDV 140cm Bows. Use bowstring wax before every Larp game to prevent premature usage.

name: Arrow Fletching, Glow in the Dark
description: Larp Arrow Fletching need to be replaced from time to time due to the constant friction off the side of the bow or off your armband. The IDV arrow vanes sometimes will become used and will require replacement from time to time. Remember to use our fletchers glue to repair or replace loose fletching.

name: Arrow Fletching, Red
description: Larp Arrow Fletching need to be replaced from time to time due to the constant friction off the side of the bow or off your armband. The IDV arrow vanes sometimes will become used and will require replacement from time to time. Remember to use our fletchers glue to repair or replace loose fletching.

name: Crossbow Bolt Fletching, Black
description: Larp crossbow bolt fletching need to replacing from time to time due to the constant impact from the string. Inspect your IDV crossbow bolts before each game and repair or replace all damaged ones. Remember to use our fletchers glue to repair or replace loose fletching.

name: Archery Target Blue
description: Our Black and Blue Target is a great accessory for the serious LARP archer, designed specifically for foam and rubber tipped arrows. Made from thick sturdy foam, this target features 5 circles that punch out when hit by an arrow. Improve your aim by creating a safe competitive archery game

name: Arrow Fletching, Green
description: Larp Arrow Fletching need to be replaced from time to time due to the constant friction off the side of the bow or off your armband. The IDV arrow vanes sometimes will become used and will require replacement from time to time. Remember to use our fletchers glue to repair or replace loose fletching.

name: IDV Bow String 120cm
description: Les cordes d’arcs ont parfois besoin de remplacement et les arcs IDV ne font pas exception. Cette corde d'arc a été fait pour tous les arcs IDV de 120cm. Utilisez la cire pour corde d’arc avant chaque GN pour éviter toute usure prématurée de votre corde.

name: Instant Glue for Nock and Feathers
description: Use this instant glue to fix your Larp arrow nocks and fletching securely onto the arrow shaft. This archery glue is always useful to have to repair any fletching that might have come loose during your last tag archery or Larp event. Use hot water to release broken parts then glue new one quickly in place ready for use in just minutes.

name: Arrow Nock, Black
description: The arrow nock is one of the first things that may break on an arrow due to the strain it must take when launched from a Larp bow. When a larp arrow bounces back and lands on a hard surface the arrow nock might fracture. Please inspect and replace damaged nocks when needed and before every Larp.

name: Tex Tite Wax
description: The Tex-Tite bow string wax is ideal for any Larp bowstring, and should be used as a regular maintenance to keep your Larp bow in optimal shape. Simply apply directly onto the string the rub it into the fibers using your fingers. This will help hold the strands of the strings together and is perfect for any Larp bows.
